<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\58132759664_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-09.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:28 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:247.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">EXHIBIT &#147;B&#148;</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">WORKLETTER</font></u></b><font style="font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;">  </font><font style="text-transform:none;">AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS WORKLETTER is
dated November 17, 2006, by and between SEVENTEENTH STREET PLAZA REALTY HOLDING
COMPANY (&#147;Landlord&#148;) and EVERGREEN ENERGY INC. (&#147;Tenant&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">R E C I T A L S:</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This
Workletter is attached to and forms a part of that certain Office Lease dated
November 17, 2006 (&#147;Lease&#148;), pursuant to which Landlord has leased to Tenant
office space in that building known as <u>Seventeenth Street Plaza</u>, Denver,
Colorado.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
parties have agreed to make certain improvements to the Premises, upon the
terms and conditions contained in the Lease and this Workletter.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Tenant
Improvements</u>.&#160; Landlord has granted
to Tenant an allowance of up to Thirty-Five and No/100 Dollars ($35.00) per
rentable square foot of the Premises, for a total allowance of up to One
Million One Hundred Forty-Five Thousand Four Hundred Forty-Five and No/100
Dollars ($1,145,445.00) (the &#147;Tenant Improvement Allowance&#148;), for completion of
slab-to-slab Tenant Improvements in accordance with the Space Plan (hereinafter
defined).&#160; Except as provided herein, the
Tenant Improvement Allowance is for Tenant Improvements in the Premises.&#160; Landlord shall not charge to Tenant the costs
of removal of any previous tenants&#146; wiring or cabling, nor shall the same be
taken from the Tenant Improvement Allowance.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event that sufficient funds are
available in the Tenant Improvement Allowance after completion of and payment
for, the Tenant Work (hereinafter defined), Tenant may elect to utilize a
portion of the Tenant Improvement Allowance, not to exceed $5.00 per rentable
square foot of the Premises in the aggregate (for a total of up to $163,635.00)
toward the costs associated with Tenant&#146;s furniture, fixtures and equipment for
the Premises, cabling and/or wiring in the Premises, and/or relocation costs
(collectively, the &#147;Additional Tenant Costs&#148;).&#160;
Landlord shall reimburse Tenant for its Additional Tenant Costs, not to
exceed the foregoing limits, within thirty (30) days after receipt of Tenant&#146;s
documented third-party invoices therefor.&#160;
Tenant expressly acknowledges and agrees that Landlord shall have no
obligation to fund any Additional Tenant Costs from the Tenant Improvement
Allowance unless and until all of the Tenant Work has been fully paid for from
the Tenant Improvement Allowance and any Tenant Improvement Allowance still
remains.&#160; In the event the Tenant
Improvement Allowance is not used on or before June 1, 2007, Landlord shall
retain such unused portion of the Tenant Improvement Allowance, and Tenant
shall have no further rights thereto or hereunder.&#160; In the event that the cost of the Tenant
Improvements exceed the Tenant Improvement Allowance, Landlord shall provide
Tenant with an additional allowance above the Tenant Improvement Allowance, to
apply towards payment of the excess costs of the Tenant Improvements (the &#147;Excess
Allowance&#148;), and Tenant shall deposit with Landlord funds sufficient to cover
any additional projected excess costs and promptly pay to Landlord any costs in
excess thereof.&#160; Any portion of the
Excess Allowance paid by Landlord shall be paid for directly by the
Tenant.&#160; Landlord shall have the work
depicted in the Tenant Space Plan (the &#147;Tenant Work&#148;) constructed with, unless
otherwise specified, Building standard materials and in a good and workmanlike
manner pursuant to the schedule provided for herein, subject, however, to
extensions equal to the delays suffered by Landlord and caused by Tenant or by
strike, lockouts, fire or other casualty loss, acts of God, unavailability of
materials, hostile or war like action, riot or other causes beyond Landlord&#146;s
reasonable control.&#160; The Tenant Work, as
modified from time to time pursuant to the provisions of this Workletter, shall
be known as the &#147;Tenant Improvements&#148;.&#160; Subject
to the foregoing limitations, the cost of preparing the Space Plan, any other
architectural or engineering fees and the construction management fee to Jones
Lang LaSalle Americas, Inc. set forth below shall be paid for out of the Tenant
Improvement Allowance as part of the costs of the Tenant Improvements.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Tenant
Space Plan</u>.&#160; Landlord and Tenant
hereby approve the general space layout and &#147;test fit&#148; (the &#147;Space Plan&#148; or &#147;Tenant
Space Plan&#148;) prepared by Newman Cavendar &amp; Doane and attached hereto as <u>Exhibit
B-1</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Tenant
Working Drawings</u>.&#160; Based upon the
Tenant Space Plan, Landlord will cause working drawings for the improvements to
the Premises (&#147;Tenant Working Drawings&#148;) to </font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\58134235817_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-11.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:42 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">be prepared and delivered to Tenant within a period as may be reasonably
needed because of the complexity of Tenant&#146;s improvements or the nature of
Tenant&#146;s non-building standard improvements, if any.&#160; The Tenant Working Drawings will include
Tenant&#146;s partition layout, ceiling plan, electrical outlets and switches,
telephone outlets, and detailed plans and specifications for the construction
of the improvements called for under this Workletter.&#160; Tenant will furnish Landlord and its planners
with all the information necessary to enable them to complete the Tenant
Working Drawings as soon as possible, but in no event more than ten (10)
business days after execution of this Lease.&#160;
Tenant shall further respond to all requests by Landlord, or its
planner, for clarification on said information provided within three (3)
business days of said request.&#160; The cost
of all working drawings for Tenant Improvements will be paid for out of the
Tenant Improvement Allowance as part of the costs of the Tenant
Improvements.&#160; Tenant will deliver to
Landlord written acceptance or rejection of any Tenant Working Drawings
(initial or revised) within three (3) business days after Tenant receives any
such item.&#160; If Tenant fails to provide
the information or clarification outlined above, rejects the Tenant Working
Drawings (initial or revised), or fails to provide written acceptance or
rejection within the period outlined above, Landlord shall not be obligated to
proceed with any improvements of the Premises until such time as Tenant
provides such written acceptance, and any delays in construction as a result
thereof shall be deemed delays caused by Tenant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Tenant
Cost Estimate</u>.&#160; Once the Tenant
Working Drawings have been prepared and approved as provided above, Landlord
shall seek three (3) competitive bids from general contractors from Landlord&#146;s
approved bidding list.&#160; Tenant may submit
the name of one contractor to be included in the bidding process.&#160; Tenant shall be allowed to participate in the
selection of the successful bidder; provided Landlord shall make the final
selection of the general contractor.&#160; In
connection with the foregoing, Landlord shall also cause a cost estimate for
the improvements to the Premises (&#147;Tenant Cost Estimate&#148;) to be prepared and
delivered to Tenant.&#160; The Tenant will
furnish Landlord and its planners with all the information necessary to enable
them to complete the Tenant Cost Estimate.&#160;
The cost of all cost estimates for Tenant Improvements will be paid as
part of the costs of the Tenant Improvements.&#160;
Tenant will deliver to Landlord written acceptance or rejection of any
Tenant Cost Estimate (initial or revised) within three (3) business days after
Tenant receives any such item.&#160; If Tenant
rejects the Tenant Cost Estimate, or fails to provide written acceptance or
rejection within said three (3) business day period, Landlord shall not be
obligated to proceed with any improvements of the Premises until such time as
Tenant provides such written acceptance, and any delays in construction as a
result thereof shall be deemed delays caused by Tenant.&#160; If at any time the costs of the Tenant
Improvements as reasonably projected by Landlord exceed the Tenant Improvement
Allowance, Tenant shall pay any such excess to Landlord in a manner reasonably
acceptable to Landlord, and, until such payment, Landlord shall not be
obligated to proceed with any improvements of the Premises, and any delays in
construction as a result thereof shall be deemed delays caused by Tenant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Upon
written approval of the Tenant Working Drawings and the Tenant Cost Estimate by
Tenant, Landlord and Tenant shall be deemed to have given final approval to the
Working Drawings, and the costs thereof, and Landlord shall be authorized to
proceed with construction.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Change
Orders</u>.&#160; Tenant may request changes
in the work during construction only by written requests to Landlord&#146;s
Representative on a form approved by Landlord.&#160;
All such changes will be subject to Landlord&#146;s prior written approval,
which shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.&#160; Before commencing any change, Landlord or
Landlord&#146;s agent will prepare and deliver to Tenant, for Tenant&#146;s written
approval, a change order setting forth the cost of such change, which will
include associated architectural, engineering and construction contractor&#146;s
fees.&#160; If Tenant fails to approve such
change order within three (3) business days, Landlord will not proceed to
perform the change.&#160; If Tenant timely
approves such change order, Tenant agrees to pay any amounts payable by Tenant
in connection with the change order in the manner provided in Paragraph&nbsp;<u>#6</u>
above, to the extent the Tenant Improvement Allowance is exceeded.&#160; If a request for changes in the work delays
Landlord&#146;s completion of the Tenant Improvements, then such delay shall
constitute a Tenant&#146;s Delay.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Completion
and Commencement of Rent</u>.&#160; The term
of the Lease shall commence as provided in Section&nbsp;<u>#3</u> of the Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Failure
to Perform</u>.&#160; Intentionally Omitted.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\58134235817_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-11.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:42 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Construction
Administration</u>.&#160; Landlord shall
coordinate and administer all activities of contractor(s) in the performance of
Tenant&#146;s Improvements in accordance with the plans and specifications.&#160; Tenant agrees that it will not contract with
any contractor, laborer or material supplier to perform any improvements in the
Premises without providing Landlord with notice ten (10) days prior to any
improvements and requiring said contractor, laborer or material supplier to
execute an agreement acknowledging non-liability for payment by Landlord in
accordance with C.R.S. &#167; 38-22-105.5, as amended from time to time.&#160; After the completion of the Tenant
Improvements, and within 10 days following the date of invoice, Tenant shall,
for supervision and administration of the construction and installation of the
Tenant Improvements, pay to Jones Lang LaSalle Americas, Inc. a construction
management fee equal to 1%<b><i style="font-weight:bold;">
</i></b>of the total cost of the Tenant Improvements, which may be paid
from the unused portion of the Tenant Improvement Allowance (if any).&#160; Tenant&#146;s failure to pay such construction
management fee when due shall constitute an event of default under the Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Miscellaneous.</font></p>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except
to the extent otherwise indicated herein, the initially capitalized terms used
in this Workletter Agreement shall have the meaning assigned to them in the
Lease.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
terms and provisions of this Tenant Workletter are intended to supplement and
are intended as an Amendment to the Lease and are specifically subject to all
the terms and provisions of the Lease.&#160;
In the event of conflict between the terms of this Tenant Workletter and
the Lease, then the provisions of the Workletter shall govern.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Prior
to the date the Premises are ready for occupancy Landlord&#146;s contractor and
Tenant shall inspect the Premises and jointly complete a &#147;punch list&#148; of
incomplete or defective work (the &#147;Punch List Items&#148;), and thereafter Landlord
shall exercise due diligence to cause such Punch List Items to be completed
within thirty (30) days following the date the Premises are ready for occupancy
(except for any punch list items which, despite due diligence, cannot be
completed within said thirty (30) day period).</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This
Tenant Workletter may not be amended or modified other than by supplemental
written agreement executed by authorized representatives of the parties hereto.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord
shall have the right to issue reasonable construction rules, regulations and
policies.&#160; If Tenant contests any of
these rules, regulations, or policies, Landlord agrees to take reasonable steps
to modify such rules, regulation, and policies at Tenant&#146;s request, except that
Tenant shall pay directly any related expenses of construction or of
consultants due to said changes to the extent said change exceeds the Tenant
Improvement Allowance.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; No
waiver of any default of the Tenant hereunder shall be implied from any
omission by the Landlord to take any action on account of such default if such
default persists or be repeated, and no express waiver shall affect any default
other than the default specified in the express waiver, and that only for the
time and to the extent therein stated.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except
as modified herein, the provisions of the Lease shall continue in full force
and effect.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord
neither warrants nor guarantees the accuracy of any estimated Costs or Tenant
Cost Estimates.</font></h2>

<h2 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Time
is of the essence in this Workletter Agreement, and the failure by Tenant to
timely respond or perform shall be deemed to be a Tenant&#146;s Delay, and in
addition, subject to any applicable notice and cure periods, Landlord may deem
such Tenant&#146;s Delay an Event of Default under the Lease.&#160; Tenant undertakes and agrees to, upon written
request, meet or provide written response, as the case may be, within one
business day of such written request, except as otherwise provided in this
Workletter Agreement.&#160; Any delay caused
by Tenant&#146;s failure to do so shall be deemed to be a delay caused by Tenant.</font></h2>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\fc\58134235817_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-11.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:42 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT B-1</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">TENANT SPACE PLAN</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="552" height="362" src="g60002km11i001.gif"></font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="559" height="393" src="g60002km11i002.gif"></font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\fc\58134235817_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-11.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:42 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">EXHIBIT &#147;C&#148;</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">CLEANING SCHEDULE</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord shall
furnish janitorial service to the Premises and the Building Complex as
described below:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DAILY SUNDAY THRO</font></b><font style="font-weight:bold;"><b style="font-weight:normal;">U</b></font>GH THURSDAY,
INCLUSIVE</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Sweep, dry mop or vacuum all floors complete.&#160; Remove gum, tar, etc., adhering to the floor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Empty and damp wipe all ashtrays.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Dust all horizontal surfaces that can be reached without
a ladder with a treated cloth, mitt or duster.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Clean, polish and sanitize all drinking fountains.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Sweep all steps, sidewalks and plazas.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Clean passenger elevator cab and landing doors,
including floors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Empty all waste containers.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Clean all public and private (within Premises) wash and
restrooms.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All cleaning will be performed with
approved germicidal detergents at disinfectant strengths.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All toilets and urinals will be
cleaned on all surfaces nightly; acid bowl cleaner to be used in the interior.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All wash basins, shelves, dispensers
and all other washroom fixtures will be cleaned nightly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All mirrors will be cleaned and
polished nightly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All chrome and other bright work,
including exposed plumbing, toilet seat hinges, etc., will be cleaned and
polished nightly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All waste receptacles are to be
emptied and cleaned nightly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All lavatory floors will be swept and
mopped with a germicidal detergent solution nightly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All lavatory floors will be machine
scrubbed once every three months.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Washroom supplies will be
replenished nightly and at all other times as needed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Once each month, remove hard water
stains from toilet fixtures by using bowl cleaner after normal cleaning.&#160; Follow manufacturer&#146;s recommendations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All normal rubbish and office waste paper shall be
removed from the tenant floors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WEEKLY</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Dust and wipe clean with dust cloth all desk tops.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Spot clean all doors, switch plates, wall and glass
areas.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Dust and wipe all tops of all file cabinets and
counters.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Sweep building stairwells.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Damp mop floors and/or spray buff for heavy scuffs, if
necessary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Clean glass in building directory.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Wipe all waste containers.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Wash all glass entrance doors and
side panels inside and out.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MONTHLY</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; When possible, sweep and hose down outside Plaza space,
exterior walks, trucking areas and shipping platforms.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Shampoo all elevator carpeting.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Dust all windowsills.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVERY THREE MONTHS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; When possible, wash all windows, both interior and
exterior, but not less than three times per year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Dust vertical surfaces of all furniture.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Scrub all resilient floor areas so as to maintain a
highly polished surface.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\58132614944_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-13.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:26 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SNOW AND ICE REMOVAL</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Landlord shall be responsible for snow and ice removal
from the parking lots, sidewalks and private roadways servicing the Property.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\58132614944_D10496_1779101\6000-2-km-13.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 27 13:26 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RIDER TO LEASE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Annual Base Rental</u>.&#160; Commencing on the Commencement Date, and
continuing through the Term, Tenant shall pay Annual Base Rental for the
Premises as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
 </tr>
